name: Anatomical Chart Health Care Education Collection
descr:
Anatomical Chart Health Care Education Collection is the Professional's reference for patient communication.

A beautifully designed visual reference that includes 50 of our most popular anatomy and disorder charts, organized and tabbed by therapeutic areaâ€”perfect for any primary care setting.

50 charts address the anatomy and diseases commonly discussed in primary care environments - cardiovascular diseases, digestive diseases, asthma, the musculoskeletal system and more. (see table of contents )

Tabbed pages and flipbook format let you quickly find the information you need when talking to patients.

An easel back allows the book to be propped between you and the patient, so that key concepts are easy to see and explain.

A bonus CD-ROM contains 5 easy-to-print patient education handouts on healthy living, available in English and Spanish. Handouts are PDF format, full-color and two pages with room to write notes.
